statements: UPDATE PortfolioRebalancing SET target_allocation = 0.3, rebalancing_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE client_id = 101 AND account_id = 201 AND asset_name = 'Stocks'
UPDATE PortfolioRebalancing SET current_allocation = 0.25, rebalancing_criteria = 'Sell Bonds', rebalancing_date = '2023-01-10' WHERE client_id = 102 AND account_id = 202 AND asset_name = 'Bonds'
UPDATE PortfolioRebalancing SET target_allocation = 0.25, current_allocation = 0.30 WHERE client_id = 123 AND account_id = 456 AND asset_name = 'Stocks';
UPDATE PortfolioRebalancing SET current_allocation = 0.35, rebalancing_criteria = 'High risk tolerance' WHERE account_id = 789 AND asset_name = 'Bonds';
UPDATE portfolios SET assets = '{"cash": 5000, "stocks": 10000}' WHERE id = 'c875d2b9-1fb0-4a8e-806a-5fcb3d35cd1c';
UPDATE rebalancing_criteria SET criteria_details = 'Risk tolerance: Moderate' WHERE id = '720f7cd5-0705-4901-9f67-1f50f604d9b4';
UPDATE portfolios SET portfolio_name = 'New Portfolio Name', assets = '{"bond":100, "stock":200}' WHERE id = 'f7b9b5d9-7f36-45bc-a2bf-b7a3028f51cc';
UPDATE rebalancing_criteria SET criteria_name = 'New Criteria Name', criteria_details = 'Adjust target allocation based on market conditions' WHERE id = 'a17e57e2-9a89-4414-8cc2-724e12d1eb81';
UPDATE portfolios SET portfolio_value = 15000.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE clients SET age = 35, name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE portfolios SET portfolio_value = 150000.50, rebalance_criteria = '{"stocks": 70, "bonds": 30}' WHERE id = 101
UPDATE clients SET risk_profile = 'Medium', name = 'John Doe', age = 35, contact_info = '{"email": "johndoe@example.com", "phone": "+1234567890"}' WHERE id = 201
UPDATE portfolio SET total_value = 15000.50 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE asset SET price = 25.75, quantity = 100.0 WHERE asset_id = 3;
UPDATE portfolio SET total_value = total_value + 100.00 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE asset SET price = 15.50, quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE asset_id = 3;
UPDATE portfolios SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE clients SET email = 'newemail@example.com', first_name = 'John' WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
UPDATE portfolios SET name = 'New Portfolio Name', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE clients SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = '654321e7-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
